title: march 27: Forrest Gump runs away with all The Oscars (with Frances Forever)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Forrest Gump’s big night at the Oscars in 1995, digging into the movie’s plot, casting, and filming in addition to its impressive Academy Award collection and cultural relevance. Afterwards, is joined by special guest Frances Forever. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
